mainText:
To all those Who Knew & Loved Steve Jobs

My condolences

I always thought the Apple Logo was such a flash of brilliance

The Apple was always the symbol .. I thought ... of Wisdom

When Eve offered Adam the Apple the image I believe is the image of  one
 offering Wisdom

Surely Steve Jobs gave to us .. the world...  the gift of Wisdom

His Wisdom .. unique and brilliant. Thank you Steve you taught me to love my computer and so gave me the gift of
Wisdom

Love & Light.
author: Margaret
